caption: On a beach, three people walked, and it seemed they had reached an agreement. Then, in a dimly lit room, a man and a woman were conversing. The man was asking something of the woman, and she silently accepted. However, at that moment, the man seemed to realize something and pointed out the truth. The woman suddenly became agitated, showing anger, but she appeared powerless to change the situation.Meanwhile, in another location, some people were having a meal and engaging in conversation. Afterward, the leader of the group entered a room, where a woman awaited him. He undressed, and they shared an intimate moment together.
